data.description:
The funniest guild on Ruqqus. Null funny jokes posted each day. Feel free to steal jokes from other places.

***
Rule 0: Must be a joke

Rule 1: Text posts only

Rule 2: No reposts of jokes posted in the last 7 days

Rule 3: No spam (irrelevant, meaningless, repeated posts)

Rule 4: Dark jokes must be marked as NSFW
data.description_html:

data.description:
Dungeons and Dragons (DND) is a fantasy role-playing game set in an imaginary world based loosely on medieval myth. This Guild is for learning DND, providing advice, finding groups, or sharing art, videos, stories, and other DND related content! Related Guilds:
+TableTop
+Lfg
+DnDHomebrew
+dndmemes
+BattleMaps
data.description_html:
Dungeons and Dragons (DND) is a fantasy role-playing game set in an imaginary world based loosely on medieval myth.

This Guild is for learning DND, providing advice, finding groups, or sharing art, videos, stories, and other DND related content!

Related Guilds:
+TableTop
+LFG
+DnDHomebrew
+dndmemes

data.description: Election Frauds for our 2020 Presidential elections have already been reported and confirmed. We need to ensure the integrity of our elections so the people are not scammed again like we were in 2000.
